otherNightReminder: Wake the Scribe and point to the player with the "Chosen" reminder.
name: Scribe
ability: Each night*, you learn 1 player chosen by the Demon. (Or that no one was chosen.)
flavor: To write is to be eternal, omnipresent.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected players are no longer protected. The Martyr points to two players. Mark those players with the "Protected" reminder.
name: Martyr
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: if the Demon kills either tonight, you die instead.
flavor: My sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: If the Whisper's public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
name: Whisper
ability: Each day, you may make a statement in private to the Storyteller. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
flavor: The quietude: therein lie the most profound truths.

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player dies, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

otherNightReminder: If the Zealot died tonight and a Townsfolk is dead: a dead Townsfolk is now alive.
name: Zealot
ability: If you die at night, a dead Townsfolk is resurrected.

name: Sheriff
ability: 1 of your Townsfolk neighbours is drunk. Your Townsfolk neighbours cannot be killed by the Demon.
flavor: Come with me if you want to live.

otherNightReminder: If the Crybaby is not marked with the "Chosen" reminder, they die.
name: Crybaby
ability: Each night*, if you are not chosen by another player with their ability, you die.
flavor: I'm not addicted to attention. Anyway, listen to this...

otherNightReminder: If the Jailbird died today or tonight, you may decide to kill 1 of their living neighbours. If 1 of the Jailbird's living neighbours died today or tonight, you may decide to kill the Jailbird.
name: Jailbird
ability: If either of your living neighbours die, you might die tonight. If you die, 1 of your living neighbours might die tonight.
flavor: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.

otherNightReminder: If the Necromancer has not used their ability: The Necromancer either shakes their head no, or points to a player. That player are now alive.
name: Necromancer
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they are resurrected. If good, they become your alignment.
flavor: Most men say they will fight until their last breath. I say let them fight a bit longer.

name: Patsy
ability: If the Demon dies, you might die instead.

firstNightReminder: Mark one Mitosis with the "1st" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to other Mitosis. Mark the other Mitosis with the "2nd" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to first Mitosis.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mitosis marked with the "1st" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies. Wake the Mitosis marked with the "2nd" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies.
name: Mitosis
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. There are 2 Mitosis in play & good must kill both to win. You know the other Mitosis. [-1 Minion]

firstNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
otherNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
name: Scourge
ability: Each night, choose to mark 2 players or kill all marked players (players die in the order in which they were marked.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
